ack.p: This work was part of the regional research projects ARCIR BioImpact 2011-11000922 and RETROSCEN 2012-12000625 (Nord – Pas-de-Calais) and was also supported by the “Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique” (CNRS). We thank the European Forest Genetic Resources Programme for providing the distribution map of common ash and the World Climate Research Programme’s Working Group on Coupled Modelling for CMIP5 data.
